attributes.action: take action to prevent North Wiltshire District Council closing three leisure centres.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Leisure centres improve the health of the nation, nurture the athletes of the future and keep kids off the street.

If you believe the previous statement you will also recognise that closure of leisure centres will increase the costs of healthcare, make it harder to achieve medals at the London Olympics and result in increased vandalism. All these factors affect the pockets of all tax payers.

Please help prevent the closure of leisure centres in North Wiltshire.
